MediaMetadata.summary: The MediaMetadata interface of the {{domxref("Media Session API", "", "", "nocode")}} allows a web page to provide rich media metadata for display in a platform UI.

MediaMetadataAlbum.summary:
The album property of the
interface returns or sets the name of the album or
collection containing the media to be played.
MediaMetadataAlbum.value: A containing the name of the album.

MediaMetadataArtist.summary:
The artist property of the
interface returns or sets the name of the artist, group,
creator, etc., of the media to be played.
MediaMetadataArtist.value: A containing the name of the artist.

MediaMetadataArtwork.summary:
The artwork property of the
interface returns or sets an array of
objects representing images associated with playing
media.
MediaMetadataArtwork.value: An of objects, each containing the following fields:

MediaMetadataChapterInfo.summary: NOTE Experimental The chapterInfo read-only property of the interface returns an array of chapter information metadata associated with playing media, represented by object instances.

remarks.para: The chapterInfo for a given media resource is set when it is first created, via the chapterInfo property of the constructor's initialization object.

MediaMetadataMediaMetadata.summary:
The MediaMetadata() constructor creates a new
object.

MediaMetadataTitle.summary:
The title property of the
interface returns or sets the title of the media to be
played.
MediaMetadataTitle.value: A containing the title of the media.
